quiz.question: _____ ___ pinnacle
quiz.explanation: 顶峰，达到顶峰。She worked hard to reach the pinnacle of success. 她努力工作以达到成功的顶峰。

quiz.question: _____ receptacle
quiz.explanation: 容器，垃圾容器。Put waste in the trash receptacle. 把废物放进垃圾容器。

quiz.question: ____ __ obstacle
quiz.explanation: 障碍，形成障碍。The debris would form an obstacle to traffic. 碎片会形成交通的障碍。

quiz.question: ______ cubicle
quiz.explanation: 小隔间，办公室小隔间。He worked in a small office cubicle. 他在一个小办公室小隔间工作。

quiz.question: ____ cuticle
quiz.explanation: 表皮，指甲表皮。Push back the nail cuticle gently. 轻轻推回指甲表皮。

quiz.question: _____ corpuscle
quiz.explanation: 血球，血液血球。Red blood corpuscle carry oxygen. 红血液血球携带氧气。

quiz.question: saddle __
quiz.explanation: 上马鞍，备好马鞍。The cowboy would saddle up for the ride. 牛仔会备好马鞍骑行。

quiz.question: ____ twaddle
quiz.explanation: 废话，说废话。Don't talk twaddle about things you don't understand. 不要说你不懂的废话。

quiz.question: _____ _ riddle
quiz.explanation: 谜语，解谜语。Can you solve a riddle? 你能解谜语吗？

quiz.question: coddle _ _____
quiz.explanation: 溺爱，溺爱孩子。Don't coddle a child too much. 不要过分溺爱孩子。

quiz.question: cuddle __
quiz.explanation: 拥抱，依偎。The baby would cuddle up to his mother. 婴儿会依偎母亲。

quiz.question: muddle _______
quiz.explanation: 胡乱应付，胡乱应付度过。We'll just muddle through somehow. 我们总会胡乱应付度过。

quiz.question: bridle _____
quiz.explanation: 抑制，抑制愤怒。She tried to bridle anger. 她试图抑制愤怒。

quiz.question: kindle ________
quiz.explanation: 激起，激起兴趣。The lecture would kindle interest in science. 讲座会激起对科学的兴趣。

quiz.question: dwindle _________
quiz.explanation: 减少，减少资源。The supplies would dwindle resources over time. 供应会随着时间减少资源。

quiz.question: swindle _____
quiz.explanation: 诈骗，诈骗钱财。The con artist would swindle money from victims. 骗子会诈骗受害者的钱财。

quiz.question: fondle _ ___
quiz.explanation: 抚摸，抚摸宠物。She would fondle a pet lovingly. 她会爱抚地抚摸宠物。

quiz.question: girdle ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 束腰，束腰。The belt would girdle the waist. 腰带会束腰。

quiz.question: ____ curdle
quiz.explanation: 凝结，牛奶凝结。Heat will make milk curdle. 加热会使牛奶凝结。

quiz.question: _____ clientele
quiz.explanation: 客户群，忠诚的客户群。The shop had a loyal clientele. 商店有忠诚的客户群。

quiz.question: baffle ________
quiz.explanation: 挫败，挫败企图。The security system would baffle attempts at entry. 安全系统会挫败进入的企图。

quiz.question: riffle _______
quiz.explanation: 快速翻阅，快速翻阅。She would riffle through the pages. 她会快速翻阅页面。

quiz.question: _______ rifle
quiz.explanation: 步枪，突击步枪。The soldier carried an assault rifle. 士兵携带突击步枪。

quiz.question: snuggle __
quiz.explanation: 依偎，依偎。The cat would snuggle up on the couch. 猫会在沙发上依偎。

quiz.question: inveigle ____
quiz.explanation: 诱骗，诱骗进入。He tried to inveigle into her confidence. 他试图诱骗进入她的信任。

quiz.question: ________ quadrangle
quiz.explanation: 四方院，学术四方院。Students gathered in the academic quadrangle. 学生们聚集在学术四方院。

quiz.question: rectangle _____
quiz.explanation: 长方形，长方形形状。The table had a rectangle shape. 桌子有长方形形状。

quiz.question: ______ shingle
quiz.explanation: 木瓦，木制木瓦。The roof was covered with wooden shingle. 屋顶覆盖着木制木瓦。

quiz.question: commingle _____
quiz.explanation: 混合，混合资金。Don't commingle funds from different accounts. 不要混合不同账户的资金。

quiz.question: ___________ labile
quiz.explanation: 不稳定的，情绪不稳定的。The patient was emotionally labile. 患者情绪不稳定的。

quiz.question: nubile _____
quiz.explanation: 适婚的，适婚的新娘。The nubile bride looked beautiful. 适婚的新娘看起来很美。

quiz.question: facile ________
quiz.explanation: 肤浅的，肤浅的解决方案。He proposed a facile solution. 他提出了肤浅的解决方案。

quiz.question: _____ imbecile
quiz.explanation: 低能者，十足的低能者。He acted like an utter imbecile. 他表现得像十足的低能者。

quiz.question: _____ domicile
quiz.explanation: 住所，法定住所。His legal domicile was in Texas. 他的法定住所在德克萨斯州。

quiz.question: reconcile ___________
quiz.explanation: 调解，调解分歧。They tried to reconcile differences. 他们试图调解分歧。

quiz.question: docile _____
quiz.explanation: 温顺的，温顺的孩子。The docile child followed instructions. 温顺的孩子遵循指示。

quiz.question: defile _ ______
quiz.explanation: 亵渎，亵渎神殿。Vandals would defile a shrine. 破坏者会亵渎神殿。

quiz.question: fragile _____
quiz.explanation: 易碎的，易碎的玻璃。Handle the fragile glass carefully. 小心处理易碎的玻璃。

quiz.question: ____ bibliophile
quiz.explanation: 藏书家，热衷的藏书家。The avid bibliophile collected rare books. 热衷的藏书家收集珍本书籍。

quiz.question: ______ simile
quiz.explanation: 明喻，诗意的明喻。The poet used a poetic simile. 诗人使用了诗意的明喻。

quiz.question: ____ _ facsimile
quiz.explanation: 传真，发送传真。Please send a facsimile of the document. 请发送文件的传真。

quiz.question: senile ________
quiz.explanation: 衰老的，老年痴呆症。He suffered from senile dementia. 他患有老年痴呆症。

quiz.question: juvenile ___________
quiz.explanation: 青少年的，青少年犯罪。The city struggled with juvenile delinquency. 城市与青少年犯罪作斗争。

quiz.question: febrile _______
quiz.explanation: 发热的，发热的疾病。The child had a febrile illness. 孩子患有发热的疾病。

quiz.question: sterile __________
quiz.explanation: 无菌的，无菌的器械。Use sterile instrument in surgery. 在手术中使用无菌的器械。

quiz.question: puerile ____
quiz.explanation: 幼稚的，幼稚的笑话。His puerile joke wasn't funny. 他幼稚的笑话不好笑。

quiz.question: virile ________
quiz.explanation: 男性的，男性的力量。He displayed virile strength. 他展示了男性的力量。

quiz.question: prehensile ____
quiz.explanation: 能抓握的，能抓握的尾巴。The monkey had a prehensile tail. 猴子有能抓握的尾巴。

quiz.question: tensile ________
quiz.explanation: 拉伸的，拉伸强度。Steel has high tensile strength. 钢具有高拉伸强度。

quiz.question: fissile ________
quiz.explanation: 可裂变的，可裂变的材料。Uranium is fissile material. 铀是可裂变的材料。

quiz.question: versatile ____
quiz.explanation: 多用途的，多用途的工具。This is a versatile tool. 这是多用途的工具。

quiz.question: tactile _________
quiz.explanation: 触觉的，触觉感觉。The tactile sensation was pleasant. 触觉感觉很愉快。

quiz.question: ductile _____
quiz.explanation: 可延展的，可延展的金属。Copper is a ductile metal. 铜是可延展的金属。

quiz.question: mercantile ___
quiz.explanation: 商业的，商业法。He studied mercantile law. 他学习商业法。

quiz.question: infantile ________
quiz.explanation: 幼稚的，幼稚的行为。His infantile behavior was embarrassing. 他幼稚的行为很尴尬。

quiz.question: motile _____
quiz.explanation: 能动的，能动的精子。Motile sperm can swim. 能动的精子可以游动。

quiz.question: fertile ____
quiz.explanation: 肥沃的，肥沃的土壤。The valley had fertile soil. 山谷有肥沃的土壤。

quiz.question: futile ______
quiz.explanation: 徒劳的，徒劳的努力。His futile effort achieved nothing. 他徒劳的努力一无所获。

quiz.question: ___ guile
quiz.explanation: 狡诈，使用狡诈。He would use guile to achieve his goals. 他会使用狡诈达到目的。

quiz.question: beguile ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 欺骗，欺骗观众。The magician would beguile the audience. 魔术师会欺骗观众。

quiz.question: vile ________
quiz.explanation: 卑鄙的，卑鄙的行为。His vile behavior shocked everyone. 他卑鄙的行为震惊了每个人。

quiz.question: servile ________
quiz.explanation: 奴性的，奴性的态度。His servile attitude was disturbing. 他奴性的态度令人不安。

quiz.question: _____ ___ wile
quiz.explanation: 诡计，狡诈和诡计。He used craft and wile to deceive. 他用狡诈和诡计欺骗。

quiz.question: shackle ________
quiz.explanation: 束缚，束缚进步。Regulations can shackle progress. 法规会束缚进步。

quiz.question: ramshackle ___
quiz.explanation: 摇摇欲坠的，摇摇欲坠的小屋。They lived in a ramshackle hut. 他们住在摇摇欲坠的小屋里。

quiz.question: spackle ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 填补，填补墙面。Use compound to spackle the wall. 用填料填补墙面。

quiz.question: tackle _ _______
quiz.explanation: 处理，处理问题。We need to tackle a problem immediately. 我们需要立即处理问题。

quiz.question: heckle _ _______
quiz.explanation: 起哄，起哄演讲者。Don't heckle a speaker during the presentation. 在演讲期间不要起哄演讲者。

quiz.question: buckle _____
quiz.explanation: 屈服，屈服于。Don't buckle under pressure. 不要屈服于压力。

quiz.question: ___ ______ rankle
quiz.explanation: 使恼怒，旧伤使恼怒。Old wounds rankle still. 旧伤仍然使恼怒。

quiz.question: __________ hyperbole
quiz.explanation: 夸张，修辞夸张。The speech used rhetorical hyperbole. 演讲使用了修辞夸张。

quiz.question: condole ____
quiz.explanation: 吊唁，表示吊唁。Friends came to condole with the family. 朋友们来表示吊唁家人。

quiz.question: ___ aureole
quiz.explanation: 光环，太阳光环。The sun aureole glowed beautifully. 太阳光环美丽地发光。

quiz.question: tadpole _____
quiz.explanation: 蝌蚪，蝌蚪阶段。Frogs go through a tadpole stage. 青蛙经历蝌蚪阶段。

quiz.question: _________ rigmarole
quiz.explanation: 冗长的废话，无意义的冗长的废话。The pointless rigmarole wasted time. 无意义的冗长的废话浪费时间。

quiz.question: console ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 安慰，安慰孩子。She tried to console the child. 她试图安慰孩子。

quiz.question: maple _____
quiz.explanation: 枫树，枫树糖浆。They poured maple syrup on pancakes. 他们在煎饼上倒枫树糖浆。

quiz.question: staple ____
quiz.explanation: 主食，主食食物。Rice is a staple food in Asia. 大米是亚洲的主食食物。

quiz.question: ______ steeple
quiz.explanation: 尖塔，教堂尖塔。The church steeple reached toward the sky. 教堂尖塔直指天空。

quiz.question: ____ principle
quiz.explanation: 原则，核心原则。Honesty is a core principle. 诚实是核心原则。

quiz.question: _______ disciple
quiz.explanation: 门徒，忠实的门徒。He was a devoted disciple. 他是忠实的门徒。

quiz.question: ample ________
quiz.explanation: 充足的，充足的证据。There was ample evidence. 有充足的证据。

quiz.question: cripple ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 使瘫痪，使系统瘫痪。The virus would cripple the system. 病毒会使系统瘫痪。

quiz.question: _______ tipple
quiz.explanation: 小酌，晚间小酌。He enjoyed his evening tipple. 他喜欢晚间小酌。

quiz.question: stipple ______
quiz.explanation: 点画，点画效果。The artist used a stipple effect. 艺术家使用了点画效果。

quiz.question: _____ scruple
quiz.explanation: 顾虑，道德顾虑。He had no moral scruple about lying. 他对说谎没有道德顾虑。

quiz.question: _____ hassle
quiz.explanation: 麻烦，日常麻烦。Commuting was a daily hassle. 通勤是日常麻烦。

quiz.question: tousle ____
quiz.explanation: 弄乱，弄乱头发。The wind would tousle hair. 风会弄乱头发。

quiz.question: subtle ______
quiz.explanation: 微妙的，微妙的细微差别。She understood the subtle nuance. 她理解了微妙的细微差别。

quiz.question: _____'_ mantle
quiz.explanation: 地幔，地球的地幔。The earth's mantle is very hot. 地球的地幔非常热。

quiz.question: ___'_ footle
quiz.explanation: 瞎忙，不要瞎忙。Don't footle around, get to work. 不要瞎忙，开始工作。

quiz.question: gristle _____
quiz.explanation: 软骨，有软骨的牛排。The gristle steak was hard to chew. 有软骨的牛排很难咀嚼。

quiz.question: ____ mettle
quiz.explanation: 勇气，展现勇气。The challenge will show mettle. 挑战将展现勇气。

quiz.question: settle _______
quiz.explanation: 解决，解决争端。They agreed to settle dispute. 他们同意解决争端。

quiz.question: unsettle ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 扰乱，扰乱市场。The news would unsettle the markets. 消息会扰乱市场。

quiz.question: belittle _______
quiz.explanation: 贬低，贬低努力。Don't belittle efforts of others. 不要贬低他人的努力。

quiz.question: guttle ____
quiz.explanation: 狼吞虎咽，狼吞虎咽食物。Don't guttle food so quickly. 不要这么快狼吞虎咽食物。

quiz.question: _____ shuttle
quiz.explanation: 穿梭机，太空穿梭机。The space shuttle launched successfully. 太空穿梭机成功发射。

quiz.question: _____ molecule
quiz.explanation: 分子，水分子。A water molecule has two hydrogen atoms. 水分子有两个氢原子。

quiz.question: _____ granule
quiz.explanation: 颗粒，糖颗粒。Each sugar granule dissolved quickly. 每个糖颗粒迅速溶解。
